mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plumber_args ( script_run_detail_id, script_file_id, source_subprotocol, source_database, source_extend, target_type, target_host, target_port, target_database, target_user, target_password, target_tableName, target_charset, target_extend, target_extend1, data_date, delete_sql, creator, created ) VALUES( #{scriptRunDetailId}, #{scriptFileId}, #{sourceSubprotocol}, #{sourceDatabase}, #{sourceExtend}, #{targetType}, #{targetHost}, #{targetPort}, #{targetDatabase}, #{targetUser}, #{targetPassword}, #{targetTableName}, #{targetCharset}, #{targetExtend}, #{targetExtend1}, #{dataDate}, #{deleteSql}, #{creator}, now() )
